column5: Anyone know how long you have the availability to try and get a GST refund from Canada Govt. I came upon my lodging receipts from last years trip (the second of June) and I don't believe I sent the receipt in. Also, is there a form for the refund that must sent along with the receipt or would it be possible to get the refund at the border this year? Thanks.

Mookie:Take a look at the following Canada Customs and Revenue Agency webpage:http://www.ccra-adrc.gc.ca/tax/nonre...s/index-e.htmlThere's access to additional information by clicking on "Proof of Export" or "Frequently Asked Questions".
I sent my last june Gst in about a month ago, I am thinking it said on the form one year to apply.
